        public static android.content.Intent getSendEmailIntent(java.lang.String email,
                                        java.lang.String subject,
                                        java.lang.String body,
                                        java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates the Intent to send a email with a file in attachment (the file is on internal memory)
        Parameters:
        email: - the address mail where you went to send the email
        subject: - the email's subject
        body: - the email's body
        fileName: - the name of the file that you want to attached
        Returns:
        an Intent
